entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
